isis.stitle: EC-17 ANTILOCK TRACTION CONTROLLER - INSTALLING THE EC-17 CONTROLLER

svcproc.title: EC-17 MOUNTED ON ANTILOCK RELAY VALVE OR ANTILOCK TRACTION RELAY VALVE

step1.para: After noting the relationship of the positioning marks made prior to disassembly, position and secure the EC-17 to the valve using the four hex head bolts. Torque the hex head bolts to 98 in-Ibs. (Grade 5 bolts).
Mount the assembled EC-17 and antilock relay valve on the vehicle and orient it in the position marked before removal.
Reconnect all air lines to the assembly.
Reconnect the electrical connector(s) to the EC-17 and torque the connector retaining screw ("jack screw") to 15-20 inch pounds.
Test the valve for operation and leakage prior to placing the vehicle in service.
Perform the "Initial Start Up Procedure" in the TROUBLESHOOTING section to assure proper system operation.
